-   Home
-   **Apply for Police Clearance Certificate**

---

Apply for Police Clearance Certificate

  

Go Back

A guide with you on how to apply for Police Clearance Certificate. The process to apply for a Passport can seem daunting, but it's actually quite straightforward. Here are the steps you need to follow:

![](data:image/png;base64,)

Register through the Passport Seva Online Portal. (Click on [**"Register"**](https://services2.passportindia.gov.in/forms/PreLogin) link on the Home Page).

![](data:image/png;base64,)

![](data:image/png;base64,)

![](data:image/png;base64,)

Login to the Passport Seva Online Portal with the Login ID created in Step 1

![](/psp/static/media/Group572742.fb59b43649475997da61.png)

Click **"Apply for Police Clearance Certificate"** link.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

![](data:image/png;base64,)

![](data:image/png;base64,)

Add details of each step .After RPO selection, the instructions page with the steps involved will load depending on the PSP Service you select steps for ‘Apply For Police Clearance Certificate’ are as follows:

**Step 01: Passport Type**

**Step 02: Applicant Details**

**Step 03: Family Details**

**Step 04: Address Details**

**Step 05: Other Details**

**Step 06: Self Declaration**

  

Submit your completed application. An unique Application Reference Number (ARN) will be generated. You can also save your application at any point of time and resume later.

**Please note:** Carefully validate the details before submitting the application. You will not be able to make changes to the application once it is submitted.

![](/psp/static/media/Group572744.692077c8ca17adef413c.png)

After submission of the application, you must start the payment & schedule appointment process by **clicking on View > Pay and Schedule Appointment button**  
Prior payment of applicable Passport service fee has been made mandatory for booking appointments **in all Passport Seva Kendras**  
  
**Use Schedule/Reschedule Appointment link to schedule/reschedule** an appointment (if payment is already made or an appointment is already scheduled)  
  
**Select Online Payment option, Select the ‘Appointment Quota’ (Normal/Tatkaal).** Tatkaal option is available only to the applicants with Tatkaal application. Select the preferred Passport Seva Kendra (PSK)/Post Office Passport Seva Kendra (POPSK) for appointment booking. System will display the next available appointment date for the **selected PSK/POPSK.** After verifying the details, click the **Pay and Book Appointment** button to redirect to the payment gateway. Complete the payment process.  
  
After successful payment, applicant is redirected to the Passport Seva Online Portal. The Appointment Confirmation screen is displayed along with appointment details.  
  
Users can re-schedule appointments three times except in the case of tatkaal which is once.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

![](data:image/png;base64,)

![](data:image/png;base64,)

Click the **"Print Application Receipt"** link to print the application receipt containing Application Reference Number (ARN)/Appointment Number.

**Note:** Carrying printout of Application Receipt is no longer required. An SMS with your appointment details is also accepted as proof of appointment during your visit to Passport Office.

![](/psp/static/media/Apply7thPoint.898f6e0e4a99d9de92827416d6a2d8dc.svg)

Visit the Passport Seva Kendra (PSK)/Regional Passport Office (RPO) where appointment has been booked, along with original documents.

![](/psp/static/media/IC_INFORMATION_ICON_24PX.a817c39716486004d9feecb939057bb4.svg)Note:

-   Only emergency/medical cases and preapproved categories may visit Passport Seva Kendra without appointment. Service will be provided at the discretion of Passport Seva Kendra in-charge/Passport Officer.
-   In case of minor applicants (below 4 years of age), carry the recent Passport size photograph (4.5 X 3.5 cm) with white background.
-   Resubmission of application form is required, in case the applicant does not visit the Passport Seva Kendra within 90 days from the online form submission.

  

![](data:image/png;base64,)

Document Required for PCC
